name: Coming Home (on your birthday)
description:
this game is a gift for my brother Henry's 20th birthday, filled to the brim with inside jokes. if you happen to come across this, you're welcome to enjoy it! this is also my first game, my first time composing music and first time using rpgmaker 2003!

featuring:

  • a cat
  • original music
  • some puzzles
  • distinctly australian references
  • a framed picture of donkey kong, somewhere

one playthrough from start to finish takes about 1 hour. unfortunately, this game is not avaliable on Mac

you can listen to the games soundtrack at iamprikle.bandcamp.com or on youtube

i do not intend to update this game with any more content, as it is just a gift for Henry, however, if you find a bug, please contact me on twitter and i'll try to fix it! @iamprikle
